      • countNengoDimension

        public static int countNengoDimension(int[] dimensionSizes)
                               throws MessageFormatException
        This converts (Jython) description of dimension sizes into length of single vector for Nengo.
        Parameters:
        dimensionSizes - each number represents size of a dimension (e.g. 640x480)
        Returns:
        number of elements in data
        Throws:
        MessageFormatException

      • setRosDimensions

        public static java.util.List<std_msgs.MultiArrayDimension> setRosDimensions()
        This is experimental and it should set the layout of ROS message according to dimensionSizes parsed from Jython script. Until now, it has not been tested enough.
        Parameters:
        d - list of dimensionSizes obtained bt rosMessage.getLayout(), it is empty..
        dimensionSizes - information parsed from Jython
        Returns:
        layout of ROS message filled with data from Jython
